# ATUM CREA v24.1 Documentation

> ATUM CREA is a professional-grade autonomous development system capable of creating
> any project from natural language requests, with results equivalent to a full team of developers.

This file provides an index of ATUM CREA documentation for use by LLMs.

---

## Getting Started

- `/wake` - Activate the complete system
- `CLAUDE.md` - Main documentation and configuration: knowledge/CLAUDE.md
- Hybrid Mode: Natural language + 41 slash commands

---

## Core Commands (7)

- `/wake` - Activate the complete ATUM CREA system
- `/create` - Create a new project from scratch
- `/scaffold` - Scaffold with production-ready template
- `/analyze` - Code analysis and review
- `/debug` - Systematic debugging with Hindsight recall
- `/refactor` - Code refactoring
- `/deploy` - Multi-platform deployment (Vercel, Netlify, Railway, Cloudflare)

---

## Development Commands (8)

- `/generate` - Generate code (components, routes, etc.)
- `/test` - Automated tests (unit, integration, e2e)
- `/tdd` - Test-Driven Development workflow
- `/review` - Code review
- `/review-fix` - Review + automatic fix
- `/optimize` - Performance optimization (TOON 30-60% token reduction)
- `/migrate` - Framework/version migration
- `/parallel` - Parallel execution

---

## Research & Learning Commands (7)

- `/research` - Multi-source research with MCPs
- `/deep-research` - Deep Firecrawl research
- `/papers` - ArXiv scientific papers research
- `/learn` - Save pattern/learning to Hindsight memory
- `/learn-pdf` - Analyze PDF and save to Hindsight
- `/learn-video` - Learn from YouTube (tutorials, conferences)
- `/profile` - Profile analysis

---

## Specialized Commands (9)

- `/odoo` - Odoo development (modules, views, models)
- `/odoo-module` - Complete Odoo module scaffolding
- `/odoo-migrate` - Odoo migration between versions
- `/odoo-audit` - Odoo module audit
- `/mql5` - MQL5 trading development (EAs, indicators)
- `/game` - Game development multi-engines (Phaser, Unity, Godot)
- `/3d` - 3D development (Blender, Unity, Three.js)
- `/email` - Gmail automation (read, compose, search)
- `/browser` - Browser automation multi-modes

---

## Documentation & Teams Commands (4)

- `/docs` - Technical documentation generation
- `/init-docs` - Initialize project documentation
- `/code-team` - Multimodal vision-to-code team
- `/agency` - Multi-agent hierarchical analysis

---

## Advanced Commands (6)

- `/turbo` - TURBO Mode - Fast project creation with MCPs synergy
- `/plan` - Project/feature structured planning
- `/workflow` - Workflow definition
- `/uiux` - UI/UX Feedback Team multi-agents
- `/awake` - Force complete consciousness (alias /wake debug)
- `/super` - Super-agent mode

---

## Agents (139 specialized agents in 27 categories)

### Meta Agents (6)
- PM Agent - PDCA orchestration
- Confidence Checker - Pre-execution evaluation
- Self-Checker - Post-execution validation
- Token Optimizer - 30-60% cost reduction
- Wizard Agent - Interactive questions
- Intent Parser v2.0 - Natural language detection

### Advanced Reasoning Agents (5)
- Tree-of-Thoughts - Multi-branch reasoning (+37% decision quality)
- Self-Reflection Loop - Iterative improvement (+45% output quality)
- Corrective RAG - Automatic RAG correction
- Reasoning Agent - Structured reasoning
- Workflow Generator - Workflow automation

### Core Development Agents (9)
- Frontend Developer, Backend Developer, Full-Stack Generator
- UI Designer, Autonomous Executor, Requirement Interpreter
- Self-Improver, Tester, Intent Parser

### Gaming Agents (8)
- Game Architect - Orchestration, mode selection
- Phaser Expert - 2D web games
- Three.js Expert - 3D web games
- Godot Expert - Native export GDScript
- Unity Expert - Unity 6, VR/AR, DOTS
- Networking Expert - Multiplayer, Colyseus
- Audio Expert - Sound design
- Procgen Expert - Procedural generation

### AI/ML Agents (6)
- LLM Integration Expert, ML Engineer, MLOps Engineer
- Prompt Engineer, PyTorch Expert, TensorFlow Expert

### Mobile Agents (4)
- Expo Expert, Swift iOS Expert, Kotlin Android Expert
- Flutter/Dart Expert - Cross-platform mobile

### XR Agent (1)
- WebXR Expert

### Odoo Agents (12)
- odoo-accounting-expert, odoo-education-expert, odoo-events-expert
- odoo-field-service-expert, odoo-food-beverage-expert, odoo-healthcare-expert
- odoo-hospitality-expert, odoo-integration-expert, odoo-manufacturing-expert
- odoo-orm-expert, odoo-realestate-expert, odoo-retail-pos-expert

### Specialized Agents (18)
- Accessibility Auditor, API Designer, Blockchain Expert
- Database Architect, Debugger, Documentation Generator
- Electron IPC Expert, GraphQL Expert, Hospitality Expert
- Integration Expert, Migration Expert, MQL5 Expert
- Odoo Expert, Payment Expert, Performance Optimizer
- Refactoring Expert, SEO Expert, Windows Scripting Expert

### Orchestration Agents (6)
- Queen v18, Parallel Executor v18, Memory Bridge
- Checkpoint Manager, Priority Queue, Task Decomposer

### Super-Agents (6)
- Fullstack Super, Backend Super, UI Super
- Deploy Super, Quality Super, Research Super

### Visual Agents (7)
- 3D Artist, Design Strategist, Figma Interpreter
- Screenshot Analyzer, UI Critic, UI/UX Team, Visual Diff Engine

### Quality Agents (4)
- Auto Validator, Security Auditor, Self-Healer, Validation Pipeline

### Research Agents (4)
- Deep Researcher, ArXiv Researcher, PDF Researcher, Video Researcher

### MCP Specialists (7)
- Automation Expert, Cloud Deploy Expert, Context7 Expert
- Firecrawl Expert, GraphRAG Expert, Magic UI Expert
- Security Scanner Expert

---

## Templates (149 production-ready)

### Web Applications (8)
- saas - Next.js 15, Supabase, Stripe, Clerk
- landing - Next.js 15, TailwindCSS 4, shadcn/ui
- ecommerce - Next.js 15, Prisma, Stripe
- api - Hono, Prisma 6, PostgreSQL
- rag-chatbot - Next.js 15, Ollama, pgvector
- pwa - Next.js 15, Service Worker, Workbox
- websocket-chat - Next.js 15, Socket.io, Redis
- streaming-chatbot - Next.js 15, OpenAI SDK

### Desktop & Mobile (5)
- desktop - Tauri 2.0, React, Vite
- electron-app - Electron 33, React, Vite
- mobile - Expo SDK 52+, React Native
- ios-native - SwiftUI, Swift 6, MVVM
- android-native - Jetpack Compose, Kotlin

### Games (10)
- game-web - Phaser 3, Vite, TypeScript
- game-3d-web - Three.js, Cannon-es
- game-multiplayer - Phaser 3, Colyseus, Docker
- game-roguelike - Phaser 3, rot.js, ECS
- game-puzzle - Phaser 3, TypeScript
- unity-game - Unity 6, C# 12, URP
- webxr-experience - A-Frame, Three.js, WebXR
- ai-chess, ai-tic-tac-toe, ai-3d-pygame

### AI Agents (107 templates)
- Starter agents (16): blog-to-podcast, data-analysis, meme-generator, etc.
- Advanced single agents (14): consultant, customer-support, journalist, etc.
- Multi-agent systems (10): domain-research, financial-coach, self-evolving, etc.
- Agent teams (13): competitor-intel, game-design, legal, recruitment, etc.
- RAG systems (20): agentic, corrective, hybrid, local variants
- MCP agents (5): travel-planner, browser, github, multi, notion
- Voice AI (3): audio-tour, customer-support, rag
- Chat with X (7): github, gmail, pdf, arxiv, youtube, etc.
- Memory-based (6): arxiv, travel, stateful, personalized, etc.
- Fine-tuning (3): gemma, llama, token-optimization

### Sector-specific (16)
- restaurant, real-estate, medical, wedding, fitness, hotel
- photography, education, interior-design, portfolio, blog
- agency, startup, nonprofit, github-profile, admin-dashboard

---

## MCPs (55 configured)

### Core MCPs (always active)
- Hindsight - Persistent memory (6 banks)
- Context7 - Up-to-date framework docs
- shadcn - UI components
- E2B - Python sandbox execution
- memory - Knowledge graph
- GitHub - Repos, issues, PRs
- Supabase - Backend, DB, Auth
- Firecrawl - Advanced web scraping
- Exa - AI web search
- Desktop Commander - System operations
- Playwright/Puppeteer - Browser automation
- Figma - Design import
- Mermaid - Diagrams
- PostgreSQL - Database
- Notion - Documentation

### AI-assisted Development
- dart-flutter - Dart and Flutter MCP Server for mobile development

---

## Memory System (Hindsight)

### Memory Banks (6)
- ultra-dev-memory - Code patterns, solutions
- documents - PDF analyses
- research - ArXiv papers
- patterns - Reusable patterns
- errors - Resolved errors
- trading-brain - Trading strategies

### Usage
```javascript
// Save to memory
mcp__hindsight__hindsight_retain({bank: 'ultra-dev-memory', content: '...', context: '...'})

// Recall from memory
mcp__hindsight__hindsight_recall({bank: 'ultra-dev-memory', query: '...', top_k: 5})
```

---

## Execution Modes (7)

- standard - Balanced default mode
- speed - Fast execution
- quality - Quality focus
- architect - Architecture first
- autonomous - Complete autonomy
- brainstorm - Ideation mode
- mentor - Teaching mode

---

## Active Hooks (9)

- anti-hallucination.js - Hallucination prevention
- pre-edit-check.js - Pre-edit validation
- post-edit-learn.js - Post-edit learning
- enforce-v24-rules.js - v24.1 rules enforcement
- notification-hook.js - Notification triggers
- auto-sync-hindsight.js - Auto memory sync
- start-hindsight-auto.js - Auto Hindsight startup
- pre-deploy.js - Pre-deployment validation
- auto-rollback.js - Automatic rollback

---

## Stack 2025

- Frontend: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript 5.7, TailwindCSS 4, shadcn/ui
- Backend: Supabase, Prisma 6, Hono
- Auth: Clerk (SaaS) | Supabase Auth (simple)
- Testing: Vitest, Playwright
- Mobile: Expo SDK 52+, Flutter/Dart
- Desktop: Tauri 2.0
- Games: Phaser 3, Three.js, Unity 6, Godot

---

## Key Files

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `CLAUDE.md` | Main system documentation |
| `knowledge/` | 93 knowledge files (gaming, odoo, templates, mql5) |
| `agents/` | 139 specialized agent definitions |
| `templates/` | 149 production-ready templates |
| `scripts/` | 41 automation scripts |
| `modes/` | 7 execution mode configurations |
| `.mcp.json` | MCP server configurations |

---

## Resources

- Base Directory: `C:\Claude-Code-Creation\`
- Knowledge: `knowledge/` - Stack 2025, Anthropic best practices, gaming guides
- Scripts: `scripts/` - ATUM CREA.ps1, ULTRA-DEPLOY.ps1, ULTRA-TEST.ps1

*ATUM CREA v24.1 | 55 MCPs | 139 Agents | 41 Commands + NL | 149 Templates | 9 Hooks | 7 Modes*
